characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: The defendant in this case. A likeable guy who was my friend in grade school.

characters.name: Cindy Stone
characters.description1: The victim in this case. A model, she lived in an apartment by herself.

characters.name: Winston Payne
characters.description1: The prosecutor for this case. Lacks presence. Generally bad at getting his points across.

characters.name: Frank Sahwit
characters.age: 44* (36 in the GBA, DS, and Wii versions of Phoenix Wright  Ace Attorney)
characters.description1: Discovered Ms. Stone's body. Newspaper salesman who saw Larry flee the scene.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Chief Attorney at Fey & Co.. My boss, and a very good defense attorney.
characters.description2: The victim. Chief attorney at Fey & Co. Law Offices, and an excellent defense lawyer.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: Mia's little sister. Found bent over her sister's body, crying.
characters.description2: The defendant. Mia's little sister, and a spirit medium in training.
characters.description3: Mia's little sister. Currently training to become a spirit medium.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.

characters.name: April May
characters.description1: An eye witness to the events. Testifies that she saw Maya commit the murder.
characters.description2: Stayed with someone else in the hotel on the night of the murder. Tapped Mia's phone.

characters.name: Marvin Grossberg
characters.description1: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.

characters.name: Bellboy
characters.description1: Bellboy at the Gatewater Hotel.
characters.description2: Delivered room service to Miss May at the time of the murder. Also checked her in.

characters.name: Redd White
characters.description1: An eye witness. CEO of the information gathering company, Bluecorp.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: Mia's little sister. Currently training to become a spirit medium.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: The defendant. Action star who plays the title role in "The Steel Samurai" TV Show.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Security guard at Global Studios. Claims she saw Powers heading to the scene.

characters.name: Jack Hammer
characters.description1: The victim. A former big name action star. Played the role of the Evil Magistrate.

characters.name: Assistant
characters.description1: Name: Penny Nichols. Assistant at Global Studios in charge of large props and set pieces.

characters.name: The Director
characters.description1: Name: Sal Manella. Creator of "The Steel Samurai." Present on the day of the crime.

characters.name: Cody Hackins
characters.description1: A big fan of the Steel Samurai. Present at the studio on the day of the crime.

characters.name: Dee Vasquez
characters.description1: High-ranking producer at Global Studios. Present on the day of the crime.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: Mia's little sister. Currently training to become a spirit medium.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.
characters.description2: A gifted prosecutor. The defendant in this case.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be a research student. She's camped out to photograph shooting stars.
characters.description2: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Trying to photograph Gourdy.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: A friend and former classmate. Also my first client. Often the cause of trouble.

characters.name: Marvin Grossberg
characters.description1: A veteran defense attorney, and Mia's mentor.

characters.name: Robert Hammond
characters.description1: The victim in this case. Also, the defense attorney in the DL-6 Incident.

characters.name: Misty Fey
characters.description1: Mia and Maya's mother, and a spirit medium. Disappeared after the DL-6 Incident.

characters.name: Gregory Edgeworth
characters.description1: Victim in the DL-6 Incident, 15 years ago. A defense attorney and Miles's father.

characters.name: Manfred von Karma
characters.description1: Veteran prosecutor who hasn't lost a case in his 40-year career. Edgeworth's mentor.

characters.name: Old Caretaker → Yanni Yogi
characters.description1: Caretaker of the boat rental shop in Gourd Lake Park. Thinks he runs a restaurant.
characters.description2: Suspect in the DL-6 Incident. Former court bailiff, now runs a boat rental shop.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor, and a ruthless man who'd do anything to get a "guilty" verdict.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.[1]

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: High School Junior and self-styled scientific investigator.
characters.description2: High School Junior and self-styled scientific investigator. Client, sister of Lana Skye.

characters.name: Lana Skye
characters.description1: The defendant. Ema's sister, and Chief Prosecutor for the district.
characters.description2: The defendant and Chief Prosecutor for the district. Wounded on her right hand.

characters.name: Angel Starr
characters.description1: Mysterious lunchlady. Witness to the murder, known as the "Cough-Up Queen."

characters.name: Jake Marshall
characters.description1: A patrolman investigating the incident at the Prosecutor's Office. Thinks he's a cowboy.

characters.name: Bruce Goodman
characters.description1: The victim and a good man. Detective in charge of homicide in Criminal Affairs, Div. 1.

characters.name: Damon Gant
characters.description1: District Chief of Police. Though he might not seem it, he's top dog in the P.D..

characters.name: Mike Meekins
characters.description1: Patrolman with General Affairs. Suspected of killing Goodman in the evidence room.

characters.name: Joe Darke
characters.description1: Serial killer responsible for the SL-9 Incident two years ago. Was given the death penalty.

characters.name: Neil Marshall
characters.description1: Prosecutor murdered two years ago in the SL-9 incident. Jake Marshall's brother.
